question: After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family.
text: My name is Sehaj Singh currently staying at 76 Seagram Drive, just at the back side of your house. I am writing this letter to express my gratitude and appreciation for your kind act last week.

Just recently, I got my driver's license and learned to ride a bike. However, it was pure ignorance on my end when I was driving recklessly and crashed just outside your house last week. As a result, I was too unconscious and I really admire your decision of taking me to your house and calling my parents on an immediate basis. Surely, I could have landed up in much more trouble, if you would have not taken me inside your house.

As a token of gratitude, I and my parents would like to invite you over for dinner this Saturday at 8:00 pm. My mother is a very exceptional chef and will prepare a variety of seafood for the occasion.
I sincerely thank you for your benevolence act and we are looking forward to meeting you over dinner.
